  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Cell[][] cells, int levelNumber, int time)
      game is created from 2d array of cells. player, actors, and number of chips are loaded directly from the array
      Parameters:
      cells - 2d array of cells
      levelNumber - the level number
      time - time remaining in the level

      public void actorMove(Actor a, Game.Direction d)
      moves a single actor. actors can only walk on free tiles
      Parameters:
      a - actor being moved
      d - direction

    • findPlayer

      public static Player findPlayer(Cell[][] field)
      finds the player in a certain 2d array field. if there are multiple players, only the first is returned
      Parameters:
      field - the field
      Returns:
      player

    • receiveInput

      receives movement input from app
      Parameters:

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(Game.Direction d) throws IllegalArgumentException
      moves player in a certain direction if the location they're moving to is a locked door or chip/key that can be picked up, it's done then the player moves
      Parameters:
      d - direction player is moving in
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
